module.name: Extension Routes
module.description: COMMERCIAL MODULE, REQUIRES A LICENSE. Allows the explicit exclusion/inclusion of extensions for each route, including calls forwarded or followme-ed from the extension
module.changelog: *13.0.10.4* FREEPBX-14799 Issue in Oubound routes, Route settings *13.0.10.3* FREEPBX-14645 the module extension routing does not honor restrictons through the follome module *13.0.10.2* FREEPBX-14560 Time Match Time Zone under Outbound Routes Route settings *13.0.10.1* FREEPBX-14307 - Submitting extension page edits does not refresh extension routes properly *13.0.10* PHP 5.6 updates *13.0.9.2* FREEPBX-11026 Calls to unknown extensions behave differently with the Extension Routes module enabled *13.0.9.1* Allow processing of numbers prefixed with + *13.0.8* Hide config options when adding extension *13.0.7* Remove en_US Translations *13.0.6* FREEPBX-9181 Add toggle buttons for routing hook *13.0.5* FREEPBX-10383 *13.0.4.2* FREEPBX-10590 *13.0.4.1* FREEPBX-10256 Fix wording *13.0.4* #9982 issues with blind transfers *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9920 Fix invalid outbound routes views *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha1* Visual Styling Changes *12.0.11* Retry publish *12.0.10* Resolve ER_Unlicenced issue *12.0.9* Proper function calls *12.0.8* FREEPBX-7933, FREEPBX-7958 Extension Routes stop working if you have more than 26 outbound routes *12.0.7* Final fixes for zending issues *12.0.6* FREEPBX-7531 fixed in FreePBX 12 *12.0.4* Fix time-of-day issues *12.0.3* Add Class of Service integration. *12.0.1* Rewrite to work with Class of Service module. *2.11.0.4* Enable access from Class of Service 2.11.0.3 Workaround for PHP bug where array keys that contain numbers beginning with zero are converted to integers. This causes issues if you have extension numbers starting with zero 2.11.0.1 #6753 mark outbound calls as EXTERNAL so that CID Cnum ALias field is not used, #6755 Duplicate routes works with Extension Routing now 2.11.0.1 #6696 avoid AstDB corruption 2.11.0.0 Bump for 2.11 2.10.0.7 Add check/uncheck all checkbox to extensions page 2.10.0.6 Fix bug with new routes not allowing extensions by default 2.10.0.5 Add dependency on framework version 2.10.1.2 2.10.0.4 Fix JS sizing code 2.10.0.2 Fix JS for adding inputs 2.10.0.1 Packaging of ver 2.10.0.1 *2.10.0.0* First Implementation
